001package tictactoe;
002
003/**
004 * Interface for generating a move for the computer player.
005 * 
006 * @author Tapio Malmberg
007 */
008public interface ComputerPlayer {
009    /**
010     * Calculates a valid move based on the game board and
011     * the number of pieces in a row needed to win.
012     * @param gameBoard the game board
013     * @param numInARowToWin the number of pieces in a row needed to win
014     * @return the coordinate of the calculated move
015     */
016    Coordinate getMove(ImmutableGameBoard gameBoard, int numInARowToWin);
017}
